name: PRE-SALE The Original Togi
description:
TOGI Towels are currently available for Pre-Sale Ordering. Orders are expected to ship in December. 


The TOGI is a 100% Microfiber Yoga Sports Towel uniquely designed for Yogis with specific points and lines to help improve focus, form and alignment. It can also be used a travel yoga mat. Made from the highest quality materials, the TOGI is...

- Heat processed for
longer lasting colours 
- Anti-Slip
- Ultra quick drying
- Super absorbent 
- Super soft 
- Environmentally friendly 
- Vegan
- Naturally fights bacteria 

Design Details
Double Diamond = Focus Point
2 Short Green Lines =  6‚Äù (or 15.24cm) a part for Foot Placement
Blue Vertical Lines = Allignment and Foot Placement
Orange Horizontal Lines = Allignment and Foot Placement

Size
24" x 68" // 60.96cm x 172.72 (Fits within borders of nearly all yoga mats!)

The TOGI was made as a new kind of yoga sports towel that helps the yoga practitioner to improve their practice and prevent injury. For further details about our copyrighted design, see our page 'What is a Togi?'
